5★ Date 2016-10-07
Other Sites
Gamewith

The girl who had received a revelation senses the shadow of a great one from the small dragon that adorably flies about. The determination of this girl impassioned by her mission inspires her comrades, guiding the world and its people towards peace and harmony.

Gameplay Notes[edit]

Advent Eternal[edit]

  • StrengthATK is greatly boosted as HP is raised
     is unique and stacks multiplicatively with all other buffs.
  • At 100% HP,
    StrengthATK is greatly boosted as HP is raised
     equals 30% and decreases by 0.2% for every 1% HP lost, down to 10% at 0% HP.[1]

Extended Mastery Support Skill[edit]

  • Chance to withstand a lethal hit without being knocked out (leaves 1 HP).[2]
Rank Probability
1★  ?%
2★  ?%
3★ 20%
